jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description:
We are seeking a talented React Developer to join our dynamic team in our modern London office, situated in the heart of Tech City. The ideal candidate will lead complex projects and mentor junior developers while working on cutting-edge applications.

Technical Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience with React.js and its ecosystem
- Expert knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3
- Experience with Redux, React Query, and Next.js
- Strong understanding of REST APIs and GraphQL
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)

What We Offer:
- Hybrid working model (2 days office, 3 days remote)
- Annual training budget of £2,000
- Private healthcare and dental coverage
- 25 days holiday + bank holidays
- Regular team social events and hackathons

Our modern office includes standing desks, relaxation areas, and a fully stocked kitchen. We follow agile methodologies and emphasize continuous learning and innovation.

company.name: Pixel Bridge Digital
company.description: Pixel Bridge Digital is a leading technology company specializing in web development and digital solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and services to our clients while fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.

jobs.title: Angular Developer
jobs.description:
Looking for a flexible part-time role that allows you to maintain work-life balance while working on exciting projects? Join our Manchester-based team working 20-25 hours per week, with the option to work fully remote.

Required Skills:
- 3+ years of Angular experience (version 2+)
- Strong TypeScript fundamentals
- Experience with RxJS and NgRx
- Knowledge of Material Design
- Unit testing experience with Jasmine/Karma

Project Focus:
- E-commerce platforms
- Financial service applications
- Data visualization dashboards

Perks:
- Flexible working hours
- Pro-rata benefits package
- Quarterly team building events
- Learning and development opportunities

Our collaborative team structure ensures part-time members are fully integrated into project planning and decision-making processes.

company.name: Northern Tech Labs
company.description: Northern Tech Labs is a creative agency specializing in digital design and development. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity and innovation to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

jobs.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
jobs.description:
Join our rapidly growing team in Birmingham's Jewellery Quarter, where we're building the next generation of cloud-based enterprise solutions. This role offers a unique opportunity to work across our entire tech stack and influence architectural decisions.

Technical Requirements:
- Node.js & Express.js expertise
- MongoDB and PostgreSQL experience
- React/Vue.js frontend development
- AWS/Azure cloud services
- Docker and Kubernetes knowledge

Current Projects:
- Microservices architecture implementation
- Real-time data processing systems
- AI-powered analytics platforms

Company Culture:
- Regular knowledge sharing sessions
- Remote-first approach with optional office days
- Investment in latest technologies and tools
- Clear career progression path
- Regular hackathons and innovation days

Benefits include gym membership, mental health support, and professional development allowance. Our modern office features collaboration spaces, quiet zones, and a game room.

company.name: Midland Software Solutions
company.description: Midland Software Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in digital solutions for businesses of all sizes. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, we are committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services.

jobs.title: WordPress Developer
jobs.description:
Based in Bristol's creative quarter, we're seeking a WordPress expert to join our boutique digital agency. Working in a hybrid capacity, you'll be responsible for creating bespoke WordPress solutions for our diverse client base.

Essential Skills:
- Advanced PHP development
- Custom WordPress theme development
- WooCommerce expertise
- ACF Pro and Gutenberg block development
- Performance optimization experience

Day-to-Day Activities:
- Creating custom plugins
- Theme customization
- Security implementation
- Site optimization and maintenance
- Client consultation

Work Environment:
- Flexible 20-hour work week
- Creative, informal atmosphere
- Dog-friendly office
- Regular team lunches
- Collaborative project approach

We value work-life balance and offer flexible scheduling to accommodate school runs or other commitments. Our office is easily accessible by public transport and includes bike storage facilities.

company.name: West Country Digital
company.description: West Country Digital is a dynamic agency specializing in digital marketing and web development. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where creativity and innovation thrive.

jobs.title: Python Django Developer
jobs.description:
Join our Edinburgh team in developing sophisticated e-commerce solutions using Python and Django. Located in the historic Leith district, we offer a blend of traditional Scottish hospitality with modern tech company culture.

Technical Requirements:
- 4+ years Python development experience
- Strong Django framework knowledge
- Experience with Django REST framework
- PostgreSQL and Redis expertise
- Celery and asynchronous programming
- Docker containerization

Current Projects:
- AI-powered recommendation engines
- High-performance payment systems
- International e-commerce platforms

Benefits:
- 35 days annual leave
- Private pension scheme
- Health insurance
- Annual ski trip
- Professional development budget

Our newly renovated office features stunning views of Edinburgh Castle, with dedicated quiet spaces, collaboration areas, and a rooftop garden. We promote a healthy work-life balance and offer flexible working hours.

company.name: Highland Tech Hub
company.description: Highland Tech Hub is a rapidly growing technology company specializing in e-commerce solutions. We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment where employees are encouraged to think creatively and innovate.

jobs.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
jobs.description:
Be part of Glasgow's thriving tech scene! We're looking for a Ruby on Rails developer to join our passionate team developing innovative solutions for the fintech sector. Our office is located in the vibrant Merchant City area.

Required Experience:
- 3+ years Ruby on Rails development
- SQL and PostgreSQL
- Frontend skills (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3)
- Test-driven development
- API design and implementation

Technology Stack:
- Ruby 3.x and Rails 7
- React for frontend components
- Sidekiq for background processing
- ElasticSearch
- AWS infrastructure

What Sets Us Apart:
- 4-day work week (32 hours)
- Remote-first culture
- Unlimited learning resources
- Regular international team retreats
- Commitment to open source

We believe in sustainable development practices and maintaining a healthy work-life balance. Our modern office includes a meditation room, fully equipped kitchen, and monthly wellness activities.
